column1: # F01: minio-storage - Use MinIO for distributed storage
# F02: tailscale-networking - Use Tailscale to help with connections and networking
# F03: dizzy-strategizer - A dizzy-strategizer that can inject correct components into a program regardless of language (based on schema-defined def)
# F04: diataxis-documentation - Implement Diataxis documentation framework for better understanding
# F05: nvpsm-framework - NVPSM framework for assessing deployability of components and stacks
# F06: facial-recognition - Facial recognition technology for identifying people in photos
# F07: tag-based-albums - Tag-based metadata and album system for organizing photos
# F08: notification-system - Friend notification system with shareable links to albums
# F09: calendar-albums - Automatic calendar-based album generation
# F10: remote-upload - Remote photo upload capability for friends and family
# F11: remote-viewer - Remote photo/album viewing interface
# F12: content-addressable-storage - Content Addressable Storage (CAS) to record file hashes and enable deduplication
# F13: file-provenance-manifest - Record a manifest of every file found and every path it came from
